alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 5:49PM CDT until October 15 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR WESTERN PRAIRIE AND NORTHWESTERN LONOKE COUNTIES... At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sylvania, or near Cabot, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Cabot... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Thurman... Old Austin... Parnell... Sylvania... Butlerville... Woodlawn... Fairview in Lonoke County... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
